an5.213:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, dussilo silavipanno pamadadhikaranam mahatim bhogajanim nigacchati.
an5.213:1.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, pathamo adinavo dussilassa silavipattiya.
an5.213:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, dussilassa silavipannassa papako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
an5.213:2.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, dutiyo adinavo dussilassa silavipattiya.
an5.213:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, dussilo silavipanno yannadeva parisam upasankamati—yadi khattiyaparisam, yadi brahmanaparisam, yadi gahapatiparisam, yadi samanaparisam—avisarado upasankamati mankubhuto.
an5.213:3.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, tatiyo adinavo dussilassa silavipattiya.
an5.213:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, dussilo silavipanno sammulho kalam karoti.
an5.213:4.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, catuttho adinavo dussilassa silavipattiya.
an5.213:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, dussilo silavipanno kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati.
an5.213:5.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, pancamo adinavo dussilassa silavipattiya.
an5.213:5.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca adinava dussilassa silavipattiya.
an5.213:6.3: Idha, bhikkhave, silava silasampanno appamadadhikaranam mahantam bhogakkhandham adhigacchati.
an5.213:6.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, pathamo anisamso silavato silasampadaya.
an5.213:7.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, silavato silasampannassa kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
an5.213:7.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, dutiyo anisamso silavato silasampadaya.
an5.213:8.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, silava silasampanno yannadeva parisam upasankamati—yadi khattiyaparisam, yadi brahmanaparisam, yadi gahapatiparisam, yadi samanaparisam—visarado upasankamati amankubhuto.
an5.213:8.2: Ayam bhikkhave, tatiyo anisamso silavato silasampadaya.
an5.213:9.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, silava silasampanno asammulho kalam karoti.
an5.213:9.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, catuttho anisamso silavato silasampadaya.
an5.213:10.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, silava silasampanno kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati.
an5.213:10.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, pancamo anisamso silavato silasampadaya.
an5.213:10.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca anisamsa silavato silasampadaya”ti.
